trigger.expression: {Template App Codex IA by HTTP:codex.conversor.googleComSSL.max(5m)}=0 or {Template App Codex IA by HTTP:codex.conversor.googleSemSSL.max(5m)}=0
trigger.name: Conversor: Erro ao acessar o Google

trigger.expression: {Template App Codex IA by HTTP:codex.extrator.googleComSSL.max(5m)}=0 or {Template App Codex IA by HTTP:codex.extrator.googleSemSSL.max(5m)}=0
trigger.name: Extrator: Erro ao acessar o Google

trigger.expression: {Template App Codex IA by HTTP:codex.iris.googleComSSL.max(5m)}=0 or {Template App Codex IA by HTTP:codex.iris.googleSemSSL.max(5m)}=0
trigger.name: Iris: Erro ao acessar o Google

trigger.expression: {Template App Codex IA by HTTP:codex.prisma.googleComSSL.max(5m)}=0 or {Template App Codex IA by HTTP:codex.prisma.googleSemSSL.max(5m)}=0
trigger.name: Prisma: Erro ao acessar o Google
